author: Fiach Kelly, Jack Power
title: Coronavirus: Government will ease restrictions on trial basis when spread is curbed
description: Initial changes could include limited openings of schools, DIY stores and garden centres
content:
The Government is aiming to curb the spread of coronavirus to such an extent that this will allow it to ease restrictions on a trial basis.
However, it also plans to be able to reintroduce strict measures quickly, before new infections increase substantially… [+4885 chars]
